Simple Inset Graph

# Learn about API authentication here: {{BASE_URL}}/julia/getting-started
# Find your api_key here: {{BASE_URL}}/settings/api

using Plotly


trace1 = [
  "x" => [1, 2, 3], 
  "y" => [4, 3, 2], 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
trace2 = [
  "x" => [20, 30, 40], 
  "y" => [30, 40, 50], 
  "xaxis" => "x2", 
  "yaxis" => "y2", 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
data = [trace1, trace2]
layout = [
  "yaxis2" => [
    "domain" => [0.6, 0.95], 
    "anchor" => "x2"
  ], 
  "xaxis2" => [
    "domain" => [0.6, 0.95], 
    "anchor" => "y2"
  ]
]
response = Plotly.plot(data, ["layout" => layout, "filename" => "simple-inset", "fileopt" => "overwrite"])
plot_url = response["url"]
Plotly

Plotly is the easiest and fastest way to graph and share your data online.
